lead_paragraph: World number one Lee Chong Wei is not ready to dwell on the prospect of facing arch-rival Lin Dan of China in the Rio Olympics semi-finals, after both shuttlers were drawn in the same half for the Games.

headline.print_headline: Lee Unfazed by Possible Last-Four Clash With Lin
headline.main: Lee Unfazed by Possible Last-Four Clash With Lin

snippet: World number one Lee Chong Wei is not ready to dwell on the prospect of facing arch-rival Lin Dan of China in the Rio Olympics semi-finals, after both shuttlers were drawn in the same half for the Games....
